meanings.definition: The quality or state of being absurd.
meanings.sent1: The absurdness of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: Her story was full of absurdness and made no sense.
meanings.sent3: The absurdness of wearing a winter coat in summer was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The absurdness of the traffic jam being caused by a turtle crossing was unbelievable.
meanings.sent5: The absurdness of the clown driving a spaceship stuck in everyone's memory.

meanings.sent1: He couldn't help but chuckle at the absurdness of the cartoon.
meanings.sent2: The absurdness of the magician's tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The absurdness of a cat wearing a top hat was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The absurdness of a fish riding a bicycle was beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The absurdness of a talking tree captured everyone's attention.
